item.title: Nicholas add a quote by Louis L'Amour
item.description: "One day I was speeding along at the typewriter, and my daughter - who was a child at the time - asked me, "Daddy, why are you writing so fast?" And I replied, "Because I want to see how the story turns out!" -- Louis L'Amour

item.title: Nicholas add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "I learned a long time ago not to judge people by what they look like, sound like, or by the clothes they wear. Just because a house is nice and shiny out front doesn’t mean it’s not rotting on the inside. (Kyrian)" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Nicholas add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Intentions don't matter. It's the end result we're all judged by. Evil in the name of good is still evil. And when you dance with the devil, you seldom get to pick the tune." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Nicholas add a quote by Miyamoto Musashi
item.description: "Think lightly of yourself and deeply of the world" -- Miyamoto Musashi

item.title: Nicholas add a quote by Miyamoto Musashi
item.description: "To become the enemy, see yourself as the enemy of the enemy" -- Miyamoto Musashi
